assignments.description: Assigns the single record to the record collection
assignments.name: asn_AddContentDocumentLinktoCollection
assignments.label: Add Content Document Link to Collection

assignments.description: Assigns variables to the single Content Document Link Record variable
assignments.name: asn_BL_ContentDocumentLinkRecordVarAssignment
assignments.label: Content Document Link Record Var Assignment

assignments.description: Assigns variables to the single Content Document Link Record variable
assignments.name: asn_PR_ContentDocumentLinkRecordVarAssignment
assignments.label: Content Document Link Record Var Assignment

decisions.description: Determines if any of the Primary Business Contact changed; if not, default variable values are used
decisions.name: dec_BL_PrimaryBusinessContactChanged
decisions.label: Primary Business Contact Changed

decisions.description: Determines who to send an email notification
decisions.name: dec_EmailNotifications
decisions.label: Email Notifications

decisions.description: Determines if there are Files related to the Request record
decisions.name: dec_FileCount
decisions.label: File Count

decisions.description: Determines if any of the Primary Business Contact changed; if not, default variable values are used
decisions.name: dec_PR_PrimaryBusinessContactChanged
decisions.label: Primary Business Contact Changed

decisions.description: Determines if a Project record is already related to the Request record
decisions.name: dec_PR_Related
decisions.label: Project Related

decisions.description: Determines which outcome the user selected from the previous screen
decisions.name: ocm_ObjectType
decisions.label: Object Type

Flow.description: Creates a Project or Backlog record when invoked by a button on the Request record

formulas.description: Stores a value to be used as a hyperlink specific to the org
formulas.name: fx_Hyperlink

formulas.description: Calculates a 'Reference Number' that is used in the email notification. This number is either the Project Number or the Backlog ItemV number, depending on the object and record created
formulas.name: fx_RefNumber

formulas.description: Calculates the original Requested By email to set as the default value when the Flow is invoked. This checks if the 'Requested By' lookup field is populated and sets User's email as value; if blank will use the 'Requested by Email' text field to set the value, if available.
formulas.name: fx_ReqeustedByEmail_Original

formulas.description: Calculates label value to use in the final screen for the confirmation to send an email to either the 'Primary Business Contact' or 'Enduser Contact'
formulas.name: fx_SendConfirmationEmail_Label

Flow.label: Request - Screen - Create Project/Backlog

loops.description: Loops through Files found in the get element
loops.name: loop_Files
loops.label: Files

recordCreates.description: Creates a new Backlog Item record with values from the input screen and Request record that invoked the Flow
recordCreates.name: crt_BL_Record
recordCreates.label: Story Record

recordCreates.description: Creates Content Document Link records to relate Files to the Project record
recordCreates.name: crt_ContentDocumentLink
recordCreates.label: Content Document Link

recordCreates.description: Creates a new Project record with values from the input screen and Request record that invoked the Flow
recordCreates.name: crt_PR_Record
recordCreates.label: Project Record

recordLookups.description: Gets the User record for the new Primary Business Contact selected in the previous screen
recordLookups.name: get_BL_PrimaryBusinessContact_New
recordLookups.label: Primary Business Contact Record

recordLookups.description: Gets the User record for the new Primary Business Contact selected in the previous screen
recordLookups.name: get_PR_PrimaryBusinessContact_New
recordLookups.label: Primary Business Contact Record

recordLookups.description: Gets Files related to the Request record
recordLookups.name: get_RequestFiles
recordLookups.label: Files Related to Request

recordLookups.description: Gets the Request record from which the Flow was invoked
recordLookups.name: get_RequestRecord
recordLookups.label: Request

recordUpdates.description: Updates values on the Request record that invoked the Flow
recordUpdates.name: udt_RequestRecord
recordUpdates.label: Request Record

fields.name: ipt_BL_EnduserContactEmail
fields.helpText: Defaults to the Primary Business Contact Email from the Request record if there is no User record match. Saves value to the Enduser Contact field on the Story record.

fields.name: ipt_BL_PlannedStartDate
fields.helpText: Saves value to the Planned Start Date field on the Story record.

validationRule.errorMessage: Date may not occur in the past

fields.name: ipt_BL_PlannedEndDate
fields.helpText: Defaults to Target Complete Date provided on the Request form, if available. Saves value to the Planned Deployment Date field on the Story record.

screens.description: Allows the user to select which type of object will be used to create the new record
screens.name: scn_ObjectSelection_Input
screens.label: Object Type Selection

fields.name: ipt_PR_PrimaryBusinessContactEmail
fields.helpText: Defaults to the Primary Business Contact Email from the Request record if there is no User record match. If changed, will check for a User record match and will save to the Primary Business Contact lookup field on the Project record.

fields.name: ipt_PR_PlannedStartDate
fields.helpText: Saves value to the Planned Start Date field on the Project record.

validationRule.errorMessage: Date may not occur in the past

fields.name: ipt_PR_ExpectedEndDate
fields.helpText: Defaults to Target Complete Date provided on the Request form, if available. Saves value to the Planned End Date field on the Project record.

validationRule.errorMessage: Character limit exceeded (80)
Character limit exceeded (2,000)
Character limit exceeded (2,000)
Character limit exceeded (2,000)
Character limit exceeded (2,000)

screens.description: Displays an error message to inform the user that the Request record is already related to a Project
screens.name: scn_PR_Related
screens.label: Project Related

fields.name: txt_ErrorMssg
fields.fieldText:
This Request is already related to a Project.

Please close this form and remove the related Project before proceeding.

screens.description: Screen displays confirmation that a record has been created
screens.name: scn_RecordCreation_EmailNotification
screens.label: Record Creation & Email Notification

fields.name: txt_PR_CreationConfirmationLink
fields.fieldText: ﻿{!get_PR_NewRecord.Name} has been created

fields.name: txt_BL_CreationConfirmationLink
fields.fieldText: {!get_BL_NewRecord.Name} has been created

textTemplates.name: tmp_EmailNotifcation
textTemplates.text:
**Please do not respond to this email, as it will go to an unmonitored mailbox**


The Salesforce team has reviewed your request and it has been moved to the backlog. A team member will be reaching out to inform you of next steps and to gather additional details, if needed.


Request Number: {!get_RequestRecord.Request_Number__c}

Request Description: {!get_RequestRecord.Name}

variables.description: Record collection for Content Document Link creation
variables.name: coll_ContentDocumentLinks

variables.description: Stores the recordId of the Request record that invoked the Flow
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Backlog Item record
variables.name: var_BL_RecordID

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Owner User
variables.name: var_OwnerID

variables.description: Stores the 'Planned Start Date' to be used in the Project record
variables.name: var_PlannedStartDate

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Project record
variables.name: var_PR_RecordID

variables.description: Stores the email of the Primary Business Contact User
variables.name: var_PrimaryBusinessContactEmail

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Primary Business Contact User
variables.name: var_PrimaryBusinessContactID

variables.description: Stores text to be used in the 'Project Description' field when creating the Project record
variables.name: var_ProjectDescription

variables.description: Stores text to be used in the 'Project Name' field when creating the Project record
variables.name: var_ProjectName

variables.description: Stores the email of the Requested By User
variables.name: var_RequestedByEmail

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Requested By User
variables.name: var_RequestedByID
